metadata.name: Replica
metadata.description: Meet Trevor Churchill, an Earth-born peacekeeping agent on the intergalactic hub known as The Transfer. When Trevor's already near impossible assignment becomes a bit too much for the errant detective, he turns to the only logical approach, REPLICATION.  More of a good thing can't hurt, right?!? A single clone could be helpful..unfortunately the REPLICATION process doesn't go as planned...
